mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deliveryMateriel (serialNum, deliverSerial, orderMaterielSerial, batchNum, manufactureDate, deliverCount, remark, creator,createTime,updater,updateTime) VALUES (#{serialNum},#{deliverSerial},#{orderMaterielSerial},#{batchNum}, #{manufactureDate},#{deliverCount},#{remark}, #{creator},NOW(),#{creator},NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE delivery SET orderSerial=#{orderSerial}, deliverNum=#{deliverNum}, warehouseSerial=#{warehouseSerial}, status=#{status}, receiver=#{receiver}, maker=#{maker}, makeDate=#{makeDate}, approval=#{approval}, approvalDate=#{approvalDate}, remark=#{remark}, deliverDate=#{deliverDate}, materielCount=#{materielCount}, packageCount=#{packageCount}, packageType=#{packageType}, packageSpecifications=#{packageSpecifications}, materielWeight=#{materielWeight}, serviceMoney=#{serviceMoney}, deliverer=#{deliverer}, contactNum=#{contactNum}, deliverRemark=#{deliverRemark}, reason=#{reason}, processInstanceId=#{processInstanceId}, userId=#{userId}, updater=#{updater}, updateTime=NOW() WHERE serialNum=#{serialNum}

UPDATE deliveryTransport SET transportType=#{transportType}, transport=#{transport}, port=#{port}, shipNumber=#{shipNumber}, playArrivalDate=#{playArrivalDate}, playWarehouseDate=#{playWarehouseDate}, remark=#{transportRemark}, contact=#{transportContact}, contactNum=#{transportContactNum}, updater=#{updater}, updateTime=NOW() WHERE serialNum=#{serialNum}

UPDATE takeDelivery SET warehouseSerial=#{takeDeliveryWarehouseSerial}, takeDeliverDate=#{takeDeliverDate}, receiver=#{takeDeliveryReceiver}, contactNum=#{takeDeliveryContactNum}, remark=#{takeDeliveryRemark}, updater=#{updater}, updateTime=NOW() WHERE serialNum=#{serialNum}
mapper.select: SELECT b.materielName,b.materielNum,b.specifications,b.unit,a.amount,a.serialNum AS orderMaterielSerialNum,b.manufactureDate FROM orderMateriel a LEFT JOIN materiel b ON a.materielSerial=b.serialNum WHERE orderSerial=#{serialNum}

SELECT a.serialNum,c.materielNum,c.materielName,c.specifications,c.unit,a.batchNum,a.manufactureDate,b.amount,a.deliverCount,a.remark, a.stockCount,a.unstockCount,d.warehouseName,e.positionName,a.stockRemark,a.qualifiedCount,a.unqualifiedCount,a.checkRemark, a.acceptCount,a.refuseCount,a.takeRemark,f.status FROM deliveryMateriel a LEFT JOIN orderMateriel b ON a.orderMaterielSerial=b.serialNum LEFT JOIN materiel c ON b.materielSerial=c.serialNum LEFT JOIN warehouse d ON a.warehouseSerial=d.serialNum LEFT JOIN warehousePosition e ON a.positionSerial=e.serialNum LEFT JOIN delivery f ON a.deliverSerial=f.serialNum WHERE a.deliverSerial=#{serialNum}

SELECT a.serialNum,a.deliverNum,a.deliverType,f.orderNum,a.supplyComId,a.shipper,a.receiver,a.maker,a.makeDate,a.approval,a.approvalDate,a.warehouseSerial,a.orderSerial,c.warehouseSerial AS takeWarehouseSerial, a.remark,d.warehouseName deliveryWarehouseName,d.address deliveryAddress,a.deliverDate,a.materielCount,a.packageCount,a.packageType,a.packageSpecifications, a.materielWeight,a.serviceMoney,a.deliverer,a.contactNum,a.deliverRemark,a.status, b.serialNum AS transportserialNum,b.transportType,b.transport,b.port,b.shipNumber,b.playArrivalDate,b.playWarehouseDate, b.contact transportContact,b.contactNum transportContactNum,b.remark transportRemark, e.serialNum takeWarehouseSerial,e.warehouseName takeWarehouseName,e.address takeAddress,c.takeDeliverDate,c.receiver takeDeliveryReceiver, c.contactNum takeDeliveryContactNum,c.remark takeDeliveryRemark,c.serialNum AS takeDeliverSerialNum,a.reason,a.processInstanceId,a.userId FROM delivery a LEFT JOIN deliveryTransport b ON b.deliverSerial=a.serialNum LEFT JOIN warehouse d ON a.warehouseSerial=d.serialNum AND d.delFlg='0' LEFT JOIN takeDelivery c ON c.deliverSerial=a.serialNum LEFT JOIN warehouse e ON c.warehouseSerial=e.serialNum AND e.delFlg='0' LEFT JOIN orderInfo f ON a.orderSerial=f.serialNum AND f.delFlg='0' WHERE a.serialNum=#{id}
